Travis Scott hung out with friends in Miami on Saturday before his performance at E11even night club.

articles.title: Huddersfield's 1981 Pride recreated in theatre project - BBC
articles.description: Actors recreate the day the Pride march came to Huddersfield in support of the local gay community.
articles.content:
The time the national Pride march decamped from London to Huddersfield has been recreated by actors. 
The LGBTQ+ march was held in the West Yorkshire town in July 1981, in defiance of a police campa… [+2026 chars]
